name: Rescue Alien
description:
Aliens are come in to the planet and after some time every aliens are go to home but one aline are not reach alien ship so he very sad. So are you help ready for help?

Solve amazing different adventure puzzle game. It's easy to hard.

Your goal is collect the alien ship by touch the ice bar to move the other items. Try to collect as many stars as possible. This game simple to play but very hard to pass all levels.

Features:
=======
- Addicting game play.
- Help to mind exercise.
- Adventure puzzle game.
- Supported all IOS device.

So are you ready for play? Download Now...
